ygData.subject: Greetings Fellow Addicts! *grin*
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow - I did a small search for Everquest on the off chance that I would find something... ha ha ha. I actually came by yahoo clubs to reply to a message
ygData.messageBody:
Wow -<br><br>I did a small search for Everquest
on the off chance that I would find something... ha
ha ha. I actually came by yahoo clubs to reply to a
message board.<br>How amazing is this.... anyone who
frequents here have characters on the Prexus server? I have
3 of my own on Prexus, my home on EQ because my RL
friends who got me addicted *yay* started
there.<br><br>EQ is my first RPG... it's the only thing I ever
play anymore. I waved bye bye to my PS a long time
ago... I know exactly what it is too. It's the live,
real time interaction with other people.<br>In regards
to the message about DAOC, I don't think I will even
try another RPG. EQ is my first love... I'm not
really impressed with Luclin, so I didn't buy it yet. So
I am off to log on since I took care of my other
addiction while finding this board - downloading mp3s *LOL*
Take care<br>See ya in Norrath ~ maybe<br><br>~
Lelaina Soullfyre<br> Officer for Parthas
Avengers<br><br>PS: l luv you, Blue!
